summary: Completed comprehensive testing of cattle and buffalo breed recognition app. Backend API and frontend UI are working correctly with successful AI integration using Gemini 2.5 Flash.

minor_bugs.issue: CORS OPTIONS method returns 405 Method Not Allowed
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - actual API calls work fine, only affects preflight requests

minor_issues.issue: Drag and drop test was inconclusive in automated testing
minor_issues.note: File upload via click works perfectly

passed_tests: Breed recognition API with valid/invalid data
Frontend page loading and UI elements
